name: meilisearch
description: The Meilisearch JS client for Node.js and the browser.
author: cvermand <charlotte@meilisearch.com>

scripts.build: vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && vite --mode production-umd build
scripts.test:env:browser: npm run build && node scripts/copy-umd-file.js --to ./tests/env/express/public && cd tests/env/express && npm i && npm test
scripts.test:env: npm run build && npm run test:env:nodejs && npm run test:env:esm && npm run test:env:node-ts
scripts.test:env:node-ts: cd tests/env/typescript-node && npm i && npm start
scripts.test:env:nodejs: npm run build && node tests/env/node/index.cjs && node tests/env/node/getting_started.cjs
scripts.test:env:esm: cd tests/env/esm && npm i && npm start
scripts.test:env:nitro-app: npm run build && cd tests/env/nitro-app && npm i && npm test
scripts.style: npm run fmt && npm run lint
scripts.style:fix: npm run fmt:fix && npm run lint:fix
